import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../../index.css' import { Form, Input, Button, Card } from 'antd' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import Content from './Content' import { MyContext } from '../../context' import AUTH_SERVICE from '../../services/index' class Login extends Component { state = { user: { email: '', password: '' } } handleInputs = e => { const { user } = this.state const key = e.target.name user[key] = e.target.value this.setState({ user }) console.log(this.state.user) } onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() AUTH_SERVICE.login(this.state.user) .then(response => { this.context.logUser(response.data.user) this.props.history.push('/profile') }) .catch(error => { console.log(error) }) } render() { return (
{/*COMIENZA NAVBAR */}

  • About (current)

) } } Login.contextType = MyContext export default Login
